nutech-jobfair-25-1.avif.title: NuTech Job Fair 2025 - Opening Ceremony
nutech-jobfair-25-1.avif.description: The grand opening of NuTech Job Fair 2025, showcasing opportunities in technology and innovation. Industry leaders and students gathering for networking and career opportunities.

nutech-jobfair-25-2.avif.title: Big0 Booth at NuTech Job Fair
nutech-jobfair-25-2.avif.description: Big0's booth at the NuTech Job Fair, highlighting our AI and machine learning work. Team members engaging with potential candidates and showcasing shipped projects.

nutech-jobfair-25-3.avif.title: Tech Demo Presentations
nutech-jobfair-25-3.avif.description: Live demonstrations of technology solutions at the job fair. Companies presenting their latest work and technical capabilities.

fintech-certification-1.avif.title: SZABIST FinTech Certification - Opening Session
fintech-certification-1.avif.description: Opening ceremony of the FinTech certification program at SZABIST. Industry experts and academic leaders launching the financial technology training initiative.

fintech-certification-2.avif.title: FinTech Workshop - Blockchain & Digital Payments
fintech-certification-2.avif.description: Hands-on workshop session covering blockchain technology and digital payment systems in modern finance.

fintech-certification-3.avif.title: FinTech Certification - Graduation Ceremony
fintech-certification-3.avif.description: Graduation ceremony celebrating successful completion of the FinTech certification program. Participants receiving their certificates.

stmu-talk-1.avif.title: Shifa Tameer-e-Millat University - Shield Presentation
stmu-talk-1.avif.description: Shield presentation at Shifa Tameer-e-Millat University following a talk on AI and technology in finance. Faculty and organizers recognizing the speaker's contribution.

stmu-talk-2.avif.title: Shifa Tameer-e-Millat University - Group Photo
stmu-talk-2.avif.description: Group photo of attendees at the Shifa Tameer-e-Millat University talk on AI and technology in finance.
